definition: to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
instinctive understanding, esp. of ethical issues (idiom); untrained, but with an inborn sense of right and wrong/innate moral sense
wretched feelings (opposite: 樂趣|乐趣, delight)
karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
to do good works/to be merciful
variant of 施與|施与[shi1 yu3]
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
